--总量 start DECLARE @oldmonthtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@newmonthtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@oldtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@newtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@date VARCHAR(20),@oldYearStart varchar(20),@newYearStart varchar(20),@oldYearEnd varchar(20),@newYearEnd varchar(20) SET @date='$yyyyMm$' if(len(@date)=0) SET @date=CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),getdate(),120) else if(len(@date)<8) SET @date=@date+'-01' --以9月为开始 年YTD if(convert(INT,substring(@date,6,2))>=9) begin SET @oldYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-09-01' SET @oldYearEnd = dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0)) SET @newYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120)+'-09-01' SET @newYearEnd=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0)) end else begin SET @oldYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-2)+'-09-01' SET @oldYearEnd = dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0)) SET @newYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-09-01' SET @newYearEnd=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0)) end
SET @oldmonthtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX) FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0))),0.0)/100 SET @newmonthtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX) FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>= CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120)+'-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0))),0.0)/100 SET @oldtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX)FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-01-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-12-31 23:59:59') ,0.0)/100 SET @newtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX)FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120)+'-01-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120)+'-12-31 23:59:59') ,0.0)/100
SELECT NULL ,'totalBrand','totalBrand',@oldmonthtotal,@newmonthtotal ,CASE WHEN @newmonthtotal=0 THEN '-' WHEN @oldmonthtotal=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (@newmonthtotal-@oldmonthtotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((@newmonthtotal-@oldmonthtotal)*100/@oldmonthtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((@newmonthtotal-@oldmonthtotal)*100/@oldmonthtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END ,@oldtotal,@newtotal ,CASE WHEN @newtotal=0 THEN '-' WHEN @oldtotal=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (@newtotal-@oldtotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((@newtotal-@oldtotal)*100/@oldtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((@newtotal-@oldtotal)*100/@oldtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END -------------------------- UNION ALL --品牌 统计start
SELECT brand.ITEM_NAME1,brand.ITEM_NAME ,brand.ITEM_NAME ,isnull(oldBrandmonth.oldMonthTotal,0.0) AS oldMonthTotal,isnull(newBrandmonth.newMonthTotal,0.0) AS newMonthTotal ,CASE WHEN isnull(newBrandmonth.newMonthTotal,0)=0 THEN '-' WHEN isnull(oldBrandmonth.oldMonthTotal,0)=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (newMonthTotal-oldMonthTotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((newMonthTotal-oldMonthTotal)*100/oldMonthTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((newMonthTotal-oldMonthTotal)*100/oldMonthTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END
,isnull(oldBrandyear.oldYearTotal,0.0) AS oldYearTotal,isnull(newBrandyear.newYearTotal,0.0) AS newYearTotal ,CASE WHEN isnull(newBrandyear.newYearTotal,0)=0 THEN '-' WHEN isnull(oldBrandyear.oldYearTotal,0)=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (newYearTotal-oldYearTotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((newYearTotal-oldYearTotal)*100/oldYearTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((newYearTotal-oldYearTotal)*100/oldYearTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END
FROM ( SELECT 'totalBrand' AS ITEM_NAME1,brand.ITEM_NAME ,brand.DICT_ITEM_ID
FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_PRODUCT prod ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prod.PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM brand ON (prod.BRAND_ID=brand.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY brand.ITEM_NAME,brand.DICT_ITEM_ID ) brand LEFT JOIN (-- 去年当月 SELECT brand1.ITEM_NAME,sum(r_d_sale1.BOX)/100 AS oldMonthTotal,brand1.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale1 LEFT JOIN MDM_PRODUCT prod1 ON (r_d_sale1.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prod1.PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM brand1 ON (prod1.BRAND_ID=brand1.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale1.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale1.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01' AND r_d_sale1.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0)) $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY brand1.ITEM_NAME,brand1.DICT_ITEM_ID ) oldBrandmonth ON (oldBrandmonth.DICT_ITEM_ID=brand.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN (--今年当月 SELECT brand2.ITEM_NAME,sum(r_d_sale2.BOX)/100 AS newMonthTotal,brand2.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale2 LEFT JOIN MDM_PRODUCT prod2 ON (r_d_sale2.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prod2.PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM brand2 ON (prod2.BRAND_ID=brand2.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale2.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale2.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120)+'-01' AND r_d_sale2.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0)) $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY brand2.ITEM_NAME,brand2.DICT_ITEM_ID )newBrandmonth ON (newBrandmonth.DICT_ITEM_ID=brand.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN (-- 去年 SELECT brand3.ITEM_NAME,sum(r_d_sale3.BOX)/100 AS oldYearTotal,brand3.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale3 LEFT JOIN MDM_PRODUCT prod3 ON (r_d_sale3.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prod3.PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM brand3 ON (prod3.BRAND_ID=brand3.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale3.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale3.BILL_DATE>=@oldYearStart AND r_d_sale3.BILL_DATE<=@oldYearEnd $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY brand3.ITEM_NAME,brand3.DICT_ITEM_ID )oldBrandyear ON (oldBrandyear.DICT_ITEM_ID=brand.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN (--今年 SELECT brand4.ITEM_NAME,sum(r_d_sale4.BOX)/100 AS newYearTotal,brand4.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale4 LEFT JOIN MDM_PRODUCT prod4 ON (r_d_sale4.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prod4.PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM brand4 ON (prod4.BRAND_ID=brand4.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale4.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale4.BILL_DATE>=@newYearStart AND r_d_sale4.BILL_DATE<=@newYearEnd $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY brand4.ITEM_NAME,brand4.DICT_ITEM_ID )newBrandyear ON (newBrandyear.DICT_ITEM_ID=brand.DICT_ITEM_ID)
------------------------- UNION ALL ----产品 start
SELECT prods.ITEM_NAME,prods.PROD_NAME_EN,prods.PROD_NAME_EN,isnull(oldProMonth.oldProMonthTotal,0.0) AS oldProMonthTotal,isnull(newProMonth.newProMonthTotal,0.0) AS newProMonthTotal ,CASE WHEN isnull(newProMonth.newProMonthTotal,0)=0 THEN '-' WHEN isnull(oldProMonth.oldProMonthTotal,0)=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (newProMonthTotal-oldProMonthTotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((newProMonthTotal-oldProMonthTotal)*100/oldProMonthTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((newProMonthTotal-oldProMonthTotal)*100/oldProMonthTotal) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END
,isnull(oldProYear.oldProYearTotal,0.0) AS oldProYearTotal, isnull(newProYear.newProYearTotal,0.0) AS newProYearTotal ,CASE WHEN isnull(newProYear.newProYearTotal,0)=0 THEN '-' WHEN isnull(oldProYear.oldProYearTotal,0)=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (newProYearTotal-oldProYearTotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((newProYearTotal-oldProMonthTotal)*100/oldProYearTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((newProYearTotal-oldProYearTotal)*100/oldProYearTotal) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END
FROM( SELECT brand.ITEM_NAME,prod.PROD_NAME_EN ,r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_PRODUCT prod ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prod.PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM brand ON (prod.BRAND_ID=brand.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) where 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY brand.ITEM_NAME,prod.PROD_NAME_EN,r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE ) prods LEFT JOIN ( --去年 当月 SELECT r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE,sum(r_d_sale.BOX)/100 AS oldProMonthTotal FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0)) $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY r_d_sale.TARGET_PROD_CODE ) oldProMonth ON(oldProMonth.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prods.TARGET_PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN ( --今年 当月 SELECT r_d_sale1.TARGET_PROD_CODE,sum(r_d_sale1.BOX)/100 AS newProMonthTotal FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale1 LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale1.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale1.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120)+'-01' AND r_d_sale1.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0)) $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY r_d_sale1.TARGET_PROD_CODE )newProMonth ON(newProMonth.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prods.TARGET_PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN ( --去年 SELECT r_d_sale2.TARGET_PROD_CODE,sum(r_d_sale2.BOX)/100 AS oldProYearTotal FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale2 LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale2.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale2.BILL_DATE>=@oldYearStart AND r_d_sale2.BILL_DATE<=@oldYearEnd $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY r_d_sale2.TARGET_PROD_CODE )oldProYear ON(oldProYear.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prods.TARGET_PROD_CODE) LEFT JOIN ( --今年 SELECT r_d_sale3.TARGET_PROD_CODE,sum(r_d_sale3.BOX)/100 AS newProYearTotal FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale3 LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale3.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale3.BILL_DATE>=@newYearStart AND r_d_sale3.BILL_DATE<=@newYearEnd $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY r_d_sale3.TARGET_PROD_CODE )newProYear ON(newProYear.TARGET_PROD_CODE=prods.TARGET_PROD_CODE)
